products.name: Insignia 10,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (NS-AC10P6WH-C)
products.shortDescription: The Insignia NS-AC10P6WH-C portable air conditioner provides you with the relief you need during those long, hot summer days. Its 10,000 BTU cooling capacity is capable of cooling a room 250 to 350 sq. ft. in size. It also features a 24-hour delay timer and an automatic swing function to help circulate the cool air.

products.name: Insignia Portable Air Conditioner - 12,000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: This Insignia portable air conditioner provides you with the relief you need during those long, hot summer days. Its 12,000 BTU cooling capacity is capable of cooling a room that's 420 sq. ft. in size. It also features a 24-hour delay timer and an automatic swing function to help circulate the cool air.

products.name: Cuisinart Vertical Waffle Maker
products.shortDescription: Take the hassle out of breakfast and brunch with Cuisinartâ€™s vertical waffle maker. The clever vertical design allows you to pour the batter in through the top spout while the iron is closed. A Ready-To-Eat indicator lets you know when it's time for deliciously golden Belgian waffles. Five browning levels let you cater to everyone's specific tastes.

products.name: Breville Smart Oven Pro Convection Toaster Oven - 0.8 Cu. Ft. - Die Cast Stainless
products.shortDescription: Cook tastier meals with more confidence and less hassle by adding the Breville Smart Oven convection toaster to your countertop. Its smart Element IQ technology works with 10 presets to automatically adjust 5 quartz heating elements throughout the cooking process, so that each dish is cooked with tantalizing precision and finesse.

products.name: LG 5 Cu. Ft. High Efficiency Front Load Washer (WM3170CW) - White
products.shortDescription: Spend less time doing laundry with the LG 5 cu. ft. front load washer. Remove over 95% of common household allergens like dust mites and pet dander with the Allergiene cycle. ColdWash delivers warm water performance with cold water energy savings, while 6Motion technology combines up to 6 different wash motions to deliver super clean clothes.

products.name: Dyson V6 Animal Cordless Stick Vacuum - Fuchsia
products.shortDescription: Pet hair and dander don't stand a chance against the Dyson V6 Animal cordless vacuum. Its direct drive cleaner head offers powerful suction on carpets and hard floors, while the mini motorized tool is perfect for removing pet hair and ground-in dirt from furniture or car interiors. Use the included mattress tool to easily clean stairs and landings.

products.name: KitchenAid Custom Stand Mixer - 4.26L - 325-Watt - Empire Red
products.shortDescription: Whip up everything from cake batter to mashed potatoes with the KitchenAid Custom Tilt-Head Stand Mixer. Boasting 10 speeds and a large 4.5qt. stainless steel mixing bowl, this stand mixer can prepare dough for 6 dozen cookies in a single batch. Unique Planetary Mixing Action also delivers fast, complete mixing.

products.name: Haier 14,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (HPF14XCM-B) - Black/Silver
products.shortDescription: The Haier 14000 BTU Portable dual-hose air conditioner is designed for spot cooling. The dual-hose design boosts the cooling efficiency when compared to single-hose models. It easily installs into an open window with the window exhaust kit and features cool, fan and dehumidify modes to meet all your interior climate control needs.

products.name: LG 7.4 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer (DLE3170W) - White
products.shortDescription: Reduce time spent in the laundry room and get on with your busy day with this LG 7.4 cu. ft. electric dryer. The Sensor Dry System measures moisture levels during the cycle and then automatically adjusts the drying time to deliver dry laundry every time. The stackable design with reversible door makes it easy to fit in tighter spaces.

products.name: Samsung 30" 5.9 Cu. Ft. Self-Clean Freestanding 5-Element Smooth Top Electric Range -Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Unleash the chef inside with the Samsung NE7630 range. Its true convection oven uses a series of fans to evenly distribute heat to give your meals consistent, flavourful results. With the 5.9 cu. ft. capacity, you can cook even the biggest turkey, ham, or roast. Two fast boil elements also deliver intense heat and precise control. .

products.name: Dyson Pure Cool Link Tower Air Purifier with HEPA Filter - Blue
products.shortDescription: Escape allergies when in your home with the Dyson Pure Cool Link purifier. This tower fan removes 99.7% of allergens and unpleasant odours. Designed for year-round use, this purifier easily cleans the air in cold weather, and keeps you cool in the summer with fresh purified air. The Dyson Link app lets you remotely monitor air quality in your home.

products.name: Insignia 1.6 Cu. Ft. Portable Washer (NS-TWM16WH7-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Add the convenience of a portable washer to your small living space. This portable top load washer with a 1.6 cu. ft. capacity features a compact design which is ideal for small spaces such as dorms or small apartments. It has 5 wash cycles, 3 water temperature settings, and 3 water level options so your clothes get the best clean possible.

products.name: Insignia 5.8 Cu. Ft. Upright Freezer (NS-UZ58WH6-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Satisfy your frozen food storage needs with the Insignia upright freezer. Boasting a large 5.8 cu. ft. capacity and 5 built-in cabinet shelves, this freezer offers plenty of room for your ice cream, meats, pizzas, and more.

products.name: Dyson AM11 Pure Cool Air Purifier - Blue
products.shortDescription: Sit back and relax knowing the air you're breathing at home is as clean as it gets. The Dyson Pure Cool Air Purifier houses a highly efficient filter fibre that traps potentially harmful, microscopic particles, and eliminates odours and toxic fumes. And when you need to cool off in the summer, it also circulates purified air around the whole room.

products.name: Samsung 30"  21.6 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with LED Lighting - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: The Samsung RF220 is a French door refrigerator that's 30" wide and sits flush with the depth of your cabinet for the perfect fit in any Canadian kitchen. And don't be fooled by its compact size; it offers a whopping 21.6 cu. ft. capacity for all of your refrigeration needs.

products.name: Danby 8500 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (DPA085CB1GDB)
products.shortDescription: Keep cool on sweltering days with the Danby 8,500BTU air conditioner. This portable unit can cool rooms up to 350 square feet and features a direct-drain system that can handle 23L per 24 hours. An automatic on/off feature lets you program the unit to start and stop according to your schedule for convenient use.

products.name: Amana 4.1 Cu. Ft. High Efficiency Top Load Washer (NTW4605EW) - White
products.shortDescription: Busy chore days can be taxing. Why not ease your load with this 4.1 cu. ft. IEC Amana top load washer from Whirlpool. It offers 9 wash cycles and 5 temperature settings to accommodate all kinds of loads. The durable porcelain tub protects fabrics from snags, while the high-efficiency agitator effectively fights stains without damaging your clothes.

products.name: Breville Juice Fountain Cold Centrifugal Juicer - Silver
products.shortDescription: Juice twice as much and at a fraction of the time with the Breville Juice Fountain Cold. This juicer features a super-sized, 2-litre jug and cold spin technology, which allowes juice to be filtered through a precise Italian-made micro mesh filter to ensure no heat transfer. Heat can damage delicate vitamins and minerals found in fruits and veggies.

products.name: Samsung 30" 5.9 Cu. Ft. Freestanding Smooth Top Electric Range (NE59K3310SS) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Whether you're roasting a holiday ham or baking cookies for the family, this Samsung electric range has you covered. A spacious 5.9 cu. ft. oven easily handles turkey roasters and large baking sheets, while a 5 burner cooktop lets you whip up multiple dishes at once. The convection fan oven system also distributes heat evenly to cook foods faster.

products.name: Dyson V6 Absolute Cordless Stick Vacuum - Red
products.shortDescription: Clean absolutely anywhere with Dyson's V6 Absolute cordless vacuum. It has two floor cleaning heads, a soft-roller cleaner head that picks up fine and large debris from hard floors, and a direct-drive cleaner head for removing ground-in-dirt from carpets. A HEPA filter captures allergens and produces exhaust air that's cleaner than the air you breathe.

products.name: LG Countertop Microwave - 1.1 Cu. Ft. - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Cook, reheat, and defrost foods with ease using the LG 1.1-cubic-foot countertop microwave. Featuring a moisture dome and turntable, this microwave keeps your meals moist as you cook, continually rotating it for even results.

products.name: Dyson V6 Slim Cordless Stick Vacuum - White
products.shortDescription: Cleaning doesn't need to be a chore with Dyson's V6 Slim cordless vacuum. It features a 2-tier cyclone system that captures fine dust, and it converts into a handheld vacuum, perfect for cleaning your car or getting into other tight areas. The mini motorized tool is perfect for removing pet hair and ground-in-dirt from furniture or car upholstery.

products.name: Danby 12000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (DPA120CB5WP)
products.shortDescription: Keep cool on sweltering days with the Danby 12,000BTU air conditioner. This portable unit can cool rooms up to 550 square feet and features a direct-drain system that can handle 24L per 24 hours. An automatic on/off feature lets you program the unit to start and stop according to your schedule for convenient use.

products.name: De'Longhi Pinguino 14,000 BTU Air-to-Air Portable Air Conditioner (PACAN140HPECB) - Black
products.shortDescription: With this De'Longhi Pinguino air-to-air portable air conditioner, you can cool a room, dehumidify it and purify the air. Featuring an innovative condensate recirculation system, this unit recycles condensation in the machine so there are no drips or bucket. It also has a 4105W heat pump function, so you can warm up a room and use the unit all year round.

products.name: iRobot Roomba 980 Vacuum Cleaning Robot
products.shortDescription: Enjoy cleaner floors without lifting a finger with the iRobot Roomba 980. This vacuum-cleaning robot can navigate an entire level of your home and offers 2 hours of continuous cleaning on a single charge. Download the iRobot HOME app on your iOS or Android device and remotely connect to your Roomba so you can start cleaning from anywhere.

products.name: Amana 6.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer (YNED4655EW) - White
products.shortDescription: Busy chore days can be taxing. Why not ease your load with this 6.5 cu. ft. Amana top load dryer from Whirlpool. It offers cycles and functions to make laundry day a breeze, even when you're not at home.  The nifty Wrinkle Prevent option buys you time when you're not ready to fold right away by periodically tumbling the clothes to prevent crinkles.

products.name: Honeywell Quiet Set 8-Speed Oscillating Tower Fan - 33" - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the comfort of a quiet, cooling breeze with the Honeywell Quiet Set tower fan. With Quiet Set technology and 8-speed controls you can get the optimal cooling with adjustable quiet levels. It offers 75 degrees of oscillation for a wide cooling area, plus its space-saving design makes it the ideal fan to keep any room cool, regardless of size.

products.name: Breville Duo-Temp Pro Pump Espresso Machine (BES810BSSXL) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Get a jump start to your morning with the Breville BES810BSSXL espresso machine. It features an Italian 15 bar pump with low pressure pre-infusion and programmable shot volume. The thermocoil heating system accurately controls the water temperature. The machine has all-metal construction with a stainless steel portafilter.

products.name: Insignia 5.0 Cu. Ft. Chest Freezer (NS-CZ50WH6-C) - White
products.shortDescription: This Insignia chest freezer lets you store your frozen groceries that don't fit in your fridge. Boasting a 5 cu. ft. capacity, this freezer provides ample room for your ice cream, pizzas, meats, and more. A removable storage basket gives you quick access to smaller items, while the mechanical controls allow you to make adjustments easily.

products.name: Dyson Pure Cool Link Desk Air Purifier with HEPA Filter - Blue
products.shortDescription: Escape allergies when in your home with the Dyson Pure Cool Link purifier. This desktop fan removes 99.7% of allergens and unpleasant odours. Designed for year-round use, this purifier easily cleans the air in cold weather, and keeps you cool in the summer with fresh purified air. The Dyson Link app lets you remotely monitor air quality in your home.

products.name: Samsung 23.9" 48 dB Tall Tub Built-In Dishwasher with Stainless Steel Tub (DW80F600UTS) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Tall Tub Built-In Dishwasher features six noise-reducing layers and an advanced motor-sound insulation system, providing quiet, but powerful wash cycles. It also features a Digital Leak Sensor designed to detect even the smallest leaks.

products.name: Insignia 0.9 Cu. Ft. Portable Washer (NS-TWM09WH7-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Add the convenience of a portable washer to your small living space. This portable top load washer with a 0.9 cu. ft. capacity features a compact design which is ideal for small spaces such as dorms or small apartments. It has 5 wash cycles and 3 water level options so your clothes get the best clean possible.
